headline: Albemarle Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Albemarle Corp. (NYSE: ALB) announced today that it declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.405 per share. The dividend, which has an annualized rate of $1.62, is payable October 1, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business as of September 12, 2025.

headline: Albemarle Corporation (ALB) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Albemarle (ALB) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately. So, it is worth exploring what lies ahead for the stock.
